meanings.sent1: The tree in our backyard is the leafiest one on the block.
meanings.sent2: The forest is at its leafiest during the spring season.
meanings.sent3: I tried to count the leaves on the leafiest tree, but I lost track!
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a jungle of the leafiest plants, creating a lush paradise.
meanings.sent5: The park in autumn was a riot of colors, with the leafiest trees standing out.

meanings.sent1: This salad is the leafiest I've ever seen, packed with greens.
meanings.sent2: The garden was the leafiest spot in the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his sandwich was so leafy, it could be mistaken for a tree!
meanings.sent4: The forest was a sea of green, with the leafiest trees towering above the rest.
meanings.sent5: The leafiest part of the park was a haven for birds and small animals.
